original_text: You may be bad, but even you know how to give good things to your children. Your Father in heaven knows much better than you do how to give good things to his children. He will give good things to everyone who asks him.
korean_text: 너희가 악한 자라도 좋은 것으로 자식에게 줄 줄 알거든 하물며 하늘에 계신 너희 아버지께서 구하는 자에게 좋은 것으로 주시지 않겠느냐

sentences.original_text: how to give good things to your children
sentences.korean_translation: 당신의 자녀에게 좋은 것들을 주는 법을

sentences.original_text: knows much better than you do
sentences.korean_translation: 당신보다 훨씬 더 잘 알고 있습니다

sentences.original_text: how to give good things to his children
sentences.korean_translation: 자기 자녀들에게 좋은 것들을 주는 법을
